# Color System: Split Lease Host Dashboard
**Date:** 2026-02-09
**Generated by:** Agent 3 (How it Looks)

---

## Palette Overview

### Brand Purple (Primary)
Used ONLY for: primary CTA buttons, header bar, logo mark. Target: < 8% of screen pixels.

| Token | Hex | Usage |
|---|---|---|
| `--color-primary` | `#2D1B69` | Primary CTA fill, header background |
| `--color-primary-dark` | `#1E1147` | Primary CTA hover state |
| `--color-primary-light` | `#7B4FB5` | Avatar background, decorative accents |
| `--color-primary-bg` | `#EDEAF4` | Secondary button hover, selected state bg |

### Interactive State System (Single-Hue Multi-Opacity)
All derived from `#2D1B69` at different opacities:

| Token | Opacity | Usage |
|---|---|---|
| `--color-primary-hover` | 4% | Hover background on neutral surfaces |
| `--color-primary-pressed` | 8% | Active/pressed state background |
| `--color-primary-selected` | 12% | Current/selected item background |
| `--color-primary-focus` | 100% | Focus ring (2px outline) |

## Usage Rules

### Rule 1: Purple Scarcity
Purple (`--color-primary`) appears ONLY on:
- Primary CTA buttons (fill)
- Header bar background
- Logo mark
- Focus rings

Purple NEVER appears on:
- Prices or financial figures (use `--text-primary`)
- Body text or descriptions
- Secondary UI elements
- Status badges (use semantic colors)
- Mini-stat values (use `--text-primary`)

### Rule 2: Text Color Hierarchy
Every text element gets exactly one of the 5 text levels:
| Level | Token | Used For |
|---|---|---|
| Primary | `--text-primary` | Headings, prices, stat values, listing titles |
| Secondary | `--text-secondary` | Body text, descriptions, welcome subtitle |
| Tertiary | `--text-tertiary` | Location, metadata, stat labels |
| Quaternary | `--text-quaternary` | Timestamps, stat change text, design note |
| Quinary | `--text-quinary` | Disabled text, placeholder text |

### Rule 3: Semantic Color = Status Only
- Green: success, confirmed, online, positive trend
- Amber: warning, pending, needs attention
- Red: error, declined, cancelled, negative trend
- Never use semantic colors for decoration.

### Rule 4: Badge System
All status badges follow ONE pattern:
- Background: semantic color at 12% opacity
- Text: semantic color at 100%
- Border-radius: 6px
- Height: 24px
- Padding: 4px 10px
- Font: 12px/500 weight, uppercase, letter-spacing 0.04em

### Rule 5: Interactive States
All hover/pressed/selected/focus states derive from `--color-primary`:
- Hover: 4% opacity purple bg
- Pressed: 8% opacity purple bg
- Selected: 12% opacity purple bg
- Focus: 2px ring in 100% purple with 2px white offset

## Contrast Ratio Reference

### Text on White (#FFFFFF)
| Color | Ratio | WCAG AA | WCAG AAA |
|---|---|---|---|
| `--color-neutral-900` (#18181B) | 16.8:1 | Pass | Pass |
| `--color-neutral-800` (#27272A) | 13.9:1 | Pass | Pass |
| `--color-neutral-700` (#3F3F46) | 9.6:1 | Pass | Pass (large) |
| `--color-neutral-600` (#52525B) | 7.0:1 | Pass | Pass (large) |
| `--color-neutral-500` (#71717A) | 4.6:1 | Pass | Fail |
| `--color-neutral-400` (#A1A1AA) | 2.7:1 | Fail | Fail |
| `--color-primary` (#2D1B69) | 12.2:1 | Pass | Pass |
| `--color-success` (#0F8A3F) | 4.6:1 | Pass | Fail |
| `--color-warning` (#B45309) | 4.7:1 | Pass | Fail |
| `--color-error` (#B91C1C) | 5.5:1 | Pass | Fail |

### White Text on Dark Backgrounds
| Background | Ratio | WCAG AA |
|---|---|---|
| `--color-primary` (#2D1B69) | 12.2:1 | Pass |
| `--color-primary-dark` (#1E1147) | 15.3:1 | Pass |

### Text on Page Background (#F4F4F5)
| Color | Ratio | WCAG AA |
|---|---|---|
| `--color-neutral-900` (#18181B) | 15.7:1 | Pass |
| `--color-neutral-700` (#3F3F46) | 9.0:1 | Pass |
| `--color-neutral-600` (#52525B) | 6.6:1 | Pass |
| `--color-neutral-500` (#71717A) | 4.3:1 | Pass (normal text borderline; passes at 14px+) |
